content: Hello, Anyone knows where I could find a CDA to FHIR mapping ? Does the Composition Resource has to bring all the Patient / Practioner ... resources inside or can we just make a reference to them by pointing the URL ? Thanks
see the CCDA implementation guide - http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ccda

see the CCDA implementation guide - http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ccda
